original_text: But she was unfaithful to him. She left him and went back to her parents’ home in Bethlehem, Judah. After she had been there four months,
korean_text: 그 첩이 행음하고 남편을 떠나 유다 베들레헴 그의 아버지의 집에 돌아가서 거기서 넉 달 동안을 지내매

sentences.original_text: But she was unfaithful to him.
and went back to her parents' home
After she had been there four months,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 거기서 네 달을 지낸 후,
